meanings.sent1: The inutilities of the broken machine made it impossible to fix.
meanings.sent2: The clutter in the attic was full of inutilities that needed to be thrown away.
meanings.sent3: The inutilities of the old gadgets were so obvious, they seemed to mock their own existence.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were buried in a pile of inutilities, making it hard to find a gem among the rubble.
meanings.sent5: The inutilities of the outdated software were a constant source of frustration for the employees.

meanings.sent1: The inutilities of the old car were evident in its constant breakdowns.
meanings.sent2: The inutilities of the extra steps in the process were eliminated to increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: Trying to use the broken phone was an exercise in inutilities.
meanings.sent4: The inutilities of the leaky faucet wasted both water and money.
meanings.sent5: The inutilities of the outdated system were holding back progress in the company.
